short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI assistance is just a highlight away

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*Bugfix*
- Additional popup for canvas sites
- Show more option
- Minor bugfixes
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Get instant explanations on any text by simply highlighting it!

Hold [CTRL] or [CMD] and highlight your desired text for a quick explanation.

Alternatively click the HLAI icon in the top extension bar to open the popup

Features:
- Instant explanation
- Less than 1s response time
- Saved responses for future reference
